body:
Nickolaj,

Check [this discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/infiltration-values?page=1&commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1461621&x=1#2985220Comment1461621).

On my last response you can find an example for the 50PA you are asking for. "Normally" the calculation is for ambient pressure.

-A.
